longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of British passports.
Minors:
- Foreign minors up to 18 years old 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay
